casebody.data:
In re GUTOWSKI. No. 280P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 25, 2015. Michael D. Gutowski, Waxhaw, for Gutowski, Michael D., et al. Mary Anne Gutowski, for Gutowski, Mary Anne. Emily F. Lowder, Michael T. Hosmer, Charlotte, Jeremy B. Wilkins, for Bank of America, N.A.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of August 2015 by Respondents for Stay of Foreclosure Sale:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of August 2015."
